text: Giving into hunger, you rush over to the house and begin snacking on the structure. The old lady remarks on your complete lack of manners and goes inside. You have your fill of the sugary siding and walk away, afraid that the old lady is calling the cops. After a few miles your stomach begins to hurt, and then you realize that food exposed to the outdoors for a long period of time is probably not fun to eat. You collapse, sweating, and pass out from your sickness. Then a bear eats you or something.
